description: Bridge carries routine permit loads. Load capacity is adequate for all routine permit loads approved for the route segment; no routine permit loads are restricted.
Bridge carries routine permit loads. Load capacity is adequate for some routine permit loads approved for the route segment, but some routine permit loads are restricted.
Bridge does not carry routine permit loads. Load capacity is inadequate for all routine permit loads approved for the route segment. Routine permit loads are restricted from the bridge.
Bridge does not carry routine permit loads. Routine permit loads are not approved for the route segment.
